ctx: intros Q a p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce reducestar to an evaluable reference.

ctx: intros Q a p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a : Term A n p : list (Term A n) H1 : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM p Q H2 : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a Unable to unify "inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM p Q" with "reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (mults multA (n:=n) a p) (pO A n)".

ctx: intros Q a p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros Q a p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a : Term A n p : list (Term A n) H1 : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM p Q H2 : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a H3 : list (Term A n) Unable to unify "~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a" with "~ reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (pO A n) H3".

original: intros Q a p H1 H2. unfold reducestar. constructor. - apply H1. - intro H3. apply H2. simpl. auto.
